scripts.docker:build:latest: docker build --build-arg REVISION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --build-arg VERSION=latest -t beabee/task-runner-dashboard:latest -f ./Dockerfile ../../
scripts.docker:build:local: docker build --build-arg REVISION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --build-arg VERSION=local -t beabee/task-runner-dashboard:local -f ./Dockerfile ../../
scripts.docker:restart: docker restart $(docker ps -a | grep beabee/task-runner-dashboard | awk '{print $1}')
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop $(docker ps -a | grep beabee/task-runner-dashboard | awk '{print $1}')
